articles.content: In July, goods exports fell by around 16% to $32.3 billion. This is the sixth consecutive month in which goods exports have fallen. Along similar lines, goods imports fell by 17% to $52.9 billion. Th… [+3182 chars]

articles.title: AR Rahman ties up with Mahindra: 'Never imagined I'd be creating music for EVs one day' - Moneycontrol
articles.description: AR Rahman said that he and his team are designing special sounds for drive modes, dashboard, experience moods for the new Mahindra EVs.
